captions.text: - Well hello everyone, my name
is Tyler Oakley and it is time
for another Q and Slay.
That got really angry, I'm sorry,
I did not mean to be aggressive.
So I love you!
I'm sorry, here, let me just,
come here, love me.
Let's get into this.
Okay, so Diarren says that she likes
some guy at school, but he doesn't
speak English, what is she supposed to do?
It's very simple, just give him
a little bit of this.
And then a little bit more of this.
And then before you know it...
He'll at least ask you if you need
help getting whatever you have
in your eye out of your eye.
Katy says you used to play video games
a lot when you were younger,
what was your favorite game,
and obviously I have to go with Mario Kart
even though Rainbow Road was

the end of my life, I
still loved Mario Kart.
But I just got a Wii, U?
Wii U, is that what it's called?
And I got all of these controllers
and I wanted to show them off
because they're adorable.
Look at little Princess Peach one.
And then Mario and Luigi, but I'm

more interested in this
Princess Peach one,
and I got the new Mario Kart
and I'm absolutely in love with it,
who do you guys play as?

That, I think, explains
a lot about a human.
Who do they play as in Mario Kart.
Who do you play as?
Maria would like to know will you
set my school on fire, and Maria
I will not say in a video that
I'm gonna do that because if I said it
in a video, then it has proof that
I have done it where I admitted
to being guilty of doing it,
if your school ends up being on fire.

If your school catches
on fire, it wasn't me.
TylerToTexas would like to know

what is your Audible
recommendation for this month,

and as you guys know I
have a little book club
going on here where I recommend
a new book every single month.
If you use audible.com/tyleroakley,
you get your first audio book for free.
This month I am recommending
This is Where I Leave You.

I listened to this and
I absolutely loved it
because the movie just came out.
This book was incredible, it was
funny, but also really sad, and
it's just like, it was an easy easy read
to get right through, I've been reading
it on airplanes and it's great,
so if you wanna listen to it,
audible.com/tyleroakley, again,
your first book is free, doesn't
have to be this one, but you can

get any one, they have
over 150,000 titles.
You're welcome in advance.

What Youtubers would I like
to collaborate with next?
I would love to collaborate with
a whole bunch of Youtubers that
I haven't yet collaborated with.
Like Lily, SuperWoman, I would
love to collaborate with Amazing Phil,
he is incredible, I would love to
do something with PewDiePie,
I would love to do, I mean I wanna
film with everybody.
Oprah has a YouTube channel, right?
Beyonce has a Vivo, those are my answers,
I'm collaborating with them.
Matt would like to know how is
tyleroakley.com so amazing.

Well Matt, let me tell
you, tyleroaklery.com
was founded years ago with the sole

mission of being the
best website in all time.
If you don't have that as your homepage,
I'm not quite sure what you're
doing with your life, it's probably
not a good life, just saying.
Sugguniverse wants to know have
I prayed to myself yet, no I haven't,
but there's only one way that
I can properly pray to myself
and that is by looking at this

magazine that I am in
and praying to myself.

Bam, that's me, a full
page picture of my face!
If you wanna get this magazine,
it's in stores and it's this Tiger Beat
with me on the cover right there,
so if you'd like to pray to me sometime,
it's easy to do if you just buy a magazine
with my face in it.

Dear Tyler, is that
how you start a prayer?
I don't (laughs) I don't know how
you start a prayer, it's been awhile.
You, me, Patron Saint of Thirst...
Hey yo, what what.
How's it going?
How do you pray?
I haven't prayed in a long long time.
Cool, later, deuces!
Amen, that's how you do it, bam.
What is your favorite music right now,

as you guys know, if
you follow my Spotify,
I have been loving a whole bunch
of new music lately.
New today this very day, it just dropped,
you wanna get Betty Who's new album.
It's called Take Me When You Go
and I have been loving it for awhile,
she let me listen to it early and now
that it's finally out I can tell you guys
you need to listen to it, it is
like dream pop perfect wonderfulness.

Eliana would like to know
will you sing really quick.
(sings falsetto)
You're welcome.

But yes, that is all I
have for you guys today,
I hope you liked this video.
If you did, give it a thumbs up.

Let's try to get 100,000
likes in the first day.
I think we can do it, if you're
listening this far, I'm just gonna
be like, you know what?

I'm gonna wait right
here until you push like.
It only took that long, okay so now

if you wanna see my latest
video click right there,

it's all about my time
going to visit The Talk,
I was on TV and if you wanna see
that it's right there and I'm making
a video with Julie Chen, mind boggling
that that even happened.

If you wanna hear my latest
podcast it's right there.
It's all about National Coming Out Day,
so if you want to hear some good stories,
some advice, some funny things,

we took a little funny
test, click right there,
it's hilarious and if you want to
be my Person of the Week, all you
gotta do is click right there.
Get something real cute and send
me a picture of you being cute
with it on Twitter and you might
be my Person of the Week in my next video.
But that is all I have for you guys today,
I hope you have a fabulous life
and I will see you guys next time.
Later!
(soft flute music)
Everybody wants to be my girl.

title: Setting Schools On Fire (#AskTyler #29) | Tyler Oakley
